Class JobSubmissionFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobSubmissionFiles

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class JobSubmissionFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility to manage job submission files.
